entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
